title: GoHighLevel Specialist
job_overview:
We’re looking for a highly skilled Virtual Assistant who is an expert in GoHighLevel to help us transition from a sub-account to a full agency account and build out automations, client funnels, AI agents, and integrations.

You’ll play a key role in setting up our white-labeled GoHighLevel agency platform and helping our clients get fully onboarded with automated systems. This is a hands-on, implementation-heavy role, perfect for someone who’s already familiar with the GoHighLevel ecosystem and enjoys building systems that scale.

Key Responsibilities
Transition & Setup
- Migrate our current sub-account into a fully functioning GoHighLevel agency account.
- Assist in white-label setup, including branding, domains, and system configurations.
- Recreate or transfer all necessary assets (workflows, automations, pipelines, websites, calendars, triggers) from sub-account to agency templates.

Automation & Workflow Development
-Build and customize automations, workflows, email/SMS campaigns, and funnel sequences for internal use and client accounts.
- Implement AI agents (AI chat & SMS bots) inside client funnels and campaigns.
- Set up calendar booking systems, pipelines, and nurturing sequences.

Client Account Implementation
- Set up new client sub-accounts within GoHighLevel.
- Upload contact lists, set up custom fields, and configure tagging and segmentation.
- Assist in building or cloning funnel pages and websites for client campaigns.
- Apply templates to client accounts and ensure full configuration.

Integration Management
- Set up Zapier integrations between GoHighLevel and other platforms (e.g., CRM, email platforms, form tools).
- Troubleshoot and test integrations to ensure smooth data flow and automation logic.

Ongoing Support & QA
- Test and QA all automations and funnels before deployment.
- Provide documentation or Loom video walkthroughs as needed.
- Support any GoHighLevel-related tasks required by the operations or marketing teams.

Requirements
- Proven experience with GoHighLevel (minimum 1 year), including building workflows, automations, and funnels.
- Experience setting up and managing agency-level GoHighLevel accounts is mandatory.
- Knowledge of Zapier and setting up integrations across tools and systems.
- Strong understanding of sales funnels, lead generation workflows, and contact management.
- Experience with AI agents or chat/SMS automation
- Tech-savvy, fast learner, and highly organized.
- Excellent communication skills and fluent English.

Bonus Points If You Have
- Experience with copywriting or building conversion-optimized funnels.
- Understanding of sales pipelines for service-based businesses.
- Skills in website design within GoHighLevel or using third-party builders.
- Experience working with home service or local businesses.

How to Apply- Please include:
- A short video introduction or Loom (optional but encouraged)
- Links to GoHighLevel workflows or systems you’ve built
- Brief summary of your GoHighLevel experience
- Your availability and hourly rate
